## tapState() function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function tapState<RequestData>(callbacks: {
    onError?: (error: unknown) => void;
    onIdle?: () => void;
    onLoading?: () => void;
    onRevalidate?: () => void;
    onSuccess?: (data: RequestData) => void;
}): MonoTypeOperatorFunction<RequestStateData<RequestData>>;
```
